alert.note: Alert for Butts; Henry; Newton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 9:18PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Henry, north central Butts and central Newton Counties through 945 PM EST ... At 918 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Blacksville, or over McDonough, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McDonough, Covington, Oxford, Porterdale, Blacksville, Ola, Starrsville, Fincherville, Oak Hill, and Rocky Plains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
